ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class TagListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.TagListController

  • public class TagListController
extends Object
    Controller for TagList, uses lazy singleton design pattern. The contained TagList will be automatically created when getTagList is called for the first time. Provides a set of methods which allow the TagListManagerActivity view to modify the underlying TagList data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addTag(Tag tag)
      Add a Tag to the TagList.
      void clearTagList()
      Reset the TagList to a new TagList removing all it's old contents.

      Called by TagManagerActivity when the add tag button in the newTagDialog is clicked.

      Called by TagManagerActivity when the remove tag button in the editTagDialog is clicked.

      Called by TagManagerActivity when the set tag button in the editTagDialog is clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • addTag

        public void addTag(Tag tag)
        Add a Tag to the TagList.
        Parameters:
        tag - The Tag to be added

      • removeTag

        public void removeTag(Tag tag)
        Remove the passed tag from the TagList.
        Parameters:
        tag - The Tag to be removed

      • updateTag

        public void updateTag(Tag tag,
             String newName)
        Change the name associated with tag to newName.
        Parameters:
        tag - The Tag to be modified
        newName - A String to be used as the new name for tag

      • onAddTagClick

        public boolean onAddTagClick(DialogInterface dialog)
        Called by TagManagerActivity when the add tag button in the newTagDialog is clicked. Grabs the string entered by the user and creates a new tag by that name in the TagList.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The Dialog in which the add tag button resides

      • onSetTagClick

        public boolean onSetTagClick(DialogInterface dialog,
                    Tag tag)
        Called by TagManagerActivity when the set tag button in the editTagDialog is clicked. Grabs the string entered by the user and sets the name of the selected tag to that name.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The Dialog in which the set tag button resides
        tag - The Tag to be modified

      • onRemoveTagClick

        public void onRemoveTagClick(DialogInterface dialog,
                    Tag tag)
        Called by TagManagerActivity when the remove tag button in the editTagDialog is clicked. Removes the selected tag from the TagList
        Parameters:
        dialog - The Dialog in which remove tag button resides
        tag - A Tag to be removed

      • clearTagList

        public void clearTagList()
        Reset the TagList to a new TagList removing all it's old contents.
